title: Himi 172
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Sīsū ‘oku mau mo’ua,
‘I he mahaki ni,
Hangē ko ho finangalo
Mo ho’ tu’utu’uni.
2.
‘Eiki, ke ke tokoni mai,
Ke mau hanga hake,
Pea ke mau angavaivai,
Ki he ‘Afiona.
3.
Ke kau ho mālohi lahi,
‘I he’emau vaivai;
Ko ia te mau lelei ai,
‘I homau mamahi,
4.
Pea mau fa’a vikia ai,
‘A ho māfimafi,
Pea mau malu’ia ai,
‘I he loto afi.
5.
Pea te mau ongo’i ai,
‘A ho ‘ao, ‘Eiki;
Pea ‘alu ‘i he afi,
‘O ta’e vela ai.
6.
Te mau vakai tui ma’u
Ki he ‘Afiona,
‘E Foha ‘o e Tangata,
Ko e Takimu’a. *
